mapper.select: SELECT bno,bsubject,MB.Mno,bdate,bhit,bvote,T1.tgName as tag1, T2.tgName as tag2, T3.tgName as tag3, MT.mid as userid, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM answer WHERE MB.bno=answer.bno) as answer FROM mainboard MB LEFT JOIN tag t1 on T1.tgno = mb.tgno1 LEFT JOIN tag t2 on T2.tgno = mb.tgno2 LEFT JOIN tag t3 on T3.tgno = mb.tgno3 LEFT JOIN pucomember MT on MT.mno = mb.mno WHERE MB.Bno BETWEEN 1 AND 10 AND BTNo =1
